channel.title: American on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in American on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Jack Sprat
item.description: Summary We’re boarding in Girdwood, and at night we’re looking for a good restaurant to try out. Surprisingy, Girdwood has some pretty decent finds here. The fried sweet potatoes was nice. I prefer this over thin cut sweet potato fries because you can get more fullness out of this. It was served with some jalapeno-ish creamy sauce that wasn’t spicy. I would’ve preferred it having more of a kick. The pork tenderloin special was really good.
